Package persistence

Class StorageFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • persistence.StorageFacade
  • public class StorageFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides all necessary methods of the storage layer, to any that might have a use for them.
    Author:
    rando, Benjamin Paepke
